sentences.en: after a night of heavy drinking
Drinking a lot helps the kidneys do their job.
sentences.cn: 多饮水有助于肾脏正常工作。

sentences.en: Drinking and driving is a problem all the year round.
sentences.cn: 酒后驾车是个常年存在的问题。

sentences.en: He returned from a lunchtime drinking session with his business cronies.
sentences.cn: 中午跟那帮生意上的朋友喝完酒后，他回来了。

sentences.en: He stood in my kitchen drinking beer, rambling on about Lillian.
sentences.cn: 他站在我的厨房里喝着啤酒，漫无边际地讲着有关莉莲的事情。

sentences.en: More than 100,000 people could fall ill after drinking contaminated water.
sentences.cn: 超过10万人可能会在饮用受到污染的水后患病。

sentences.en: People are still hanging out drinking beer, maybe shooting some pool.
sentences.cn: 人们仍聚在那里喝啤酒，可能还会打会儿台球。

sentences.en: Right now the poor old devil's drinking himself silly.
sentences.cn: 这会儿那可怜的老家伙又喝得糊里糊涂的了。

sentences.en: She beseeched him to cut his drinking and his smoking.
She stopped drinking but began obsessing about her weight.
sentences.cn: 她戒了酒，但又开始执著于体重问题。

sentences.en: Since 1908, chlorine has been added to drinking water.
sentences.cn: 自1908年以来氯就被添加进饮用水当中。

sentences.en: Some of the finest drinking glasses are made from lead crystal.
sentences.cn: 一些最高档的酒杯是用铅晶质玻璃制成的。

sentences.en: The drinking and the guilt fed on each other.
The villagers piped in drinking water from the reservoir.
sentences.cn: 村民用管道从水库引来饮用水。

sentences.en: They enjoy themselves drinking wine, smoking and playing cards.
sentences.cn: 他们又是喝酒抽烟，又是打牌，玩得很痛快。

sentences.en: Wine is radioactive but few people stop drinking it on that account.
sentences.cn: 酒是有放射性的，可是很少有人因此而戒酒。

phrases.tran_cn: n. （设于公共场所的）自动饮水器

trans.tran_cn: 喝（酒）( drink的现在分词 )，饮，喝酒，（尤指）酗酒
